importantArticles.headline: STEINHAUSEN, Switzerland, April 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Transocean Ltd. (NYSE: RIG) announced today that, due to a scheduling conflict, it is changing the time of its first quarter 2025 earnings call. It will now conduct the teleconference starting at 10 a.m. EDT, 4 p.m. CEST, on Tuesday, April 29, 2025. importantArticles.headline: STEINHAUSEN, Switzerland, April 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Transocean Ltd. (NYSE: RIG) today issued a quarterly Fleet Status Report that provides the current status of, and contract information for, the company’s fleet of offshore drilling rigs. As of April 16, 2025, the company’s total backlog is approximately $7.9 billion. The report can be accessed on the company’s website: www.deepwater.com. importantArticles.title: Transocean Ltd. Provides Quarterly Fleet Status Report
